data.name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix+ Extra Song Pack
data.detailed_description:
Add 72 playable tracks from Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone to your game for a total of 250 songs.

Play iconic hits such as:
• Butterfly on Your Right Shoulder -39's Giving Day Edition-
• Dreaming Leaf
• Far Away
• Innocence
• Iroha Uta
• Iya Iya Seijin
• Kagamine HachiHachi Flower Fight
• Knight of Light
• Mellow Yellow
• moon
…and so many more!

data.short_description: Adds 72 playable songs from Project DIVA: Future Tone to your game for a total of 250 songs.

fullgame.name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix+

data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100、3.1 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5850, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400、3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
